params.publicKeyHash: Hash of the validator's public key

params._capacities: Array of capacities for the job (not used in this implementation)
params._networkId: ID of the network where the job will be executed
params._payment: Payment amount for the job in SNO tokens (0 if paying with ETH)
params._userId: Unique identifier associated with P2P node for the requesting user

addNetwork(string).notice: Add a new network to the system

createValidator(bytes32).notice: Creates a new validator in the system

requestJob(bytes32,bytes32,uint8,uint256.notice: Requests a new job to be created

updateContract(bytes32[],address[],addre.notice: Updates contract with completed jobs, and triggers reward distribution
